Articles.Content:
So, everything works just fine until i'm trying to launch a vessel. After game loads to launch site game is still functional, but without vessel, kerbal, Kerbin (screen below).  I can't start the vessel, nor quit to menu after hitting esc and i have to kill it with task manager. Tried reinstall of game, scatterer and paralax. I didn't see any thread related so i posted here, if there's a post like mine i'm sorry and please link it below. 

#EDIT1: Problem solved. I'm completely deleted parallax and everything connected to it, reinstalled all of the mods i'm using and now it works.

Edited November 23, 2021 by M4T9889
found a solution to a problem
Please provide a log file.  Without it, we cannot see what errors may be occurring.
